summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PropTech Decision Copilot application. Backend APIs mostly functional (15/16 tests passed), frontend UI fully functional with excellent user experience and proper authentication flow.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 404 'Property not found' error instead of executive summary data
flaky_endpoints.impact: Executive Summary page shows error message, affecting user experience

ui_bugs.issue: Shows 'Failed to load executive summary' error message due to backend API issue

passed_tests: ✅ Dashboard page with KPI cards and data visualization
✅ Property Portfolio page with property cards and add property dialog
✅ Property Detail page with tabs and floor plan visualization
✅ Scenario Simulator with floor selection and simulation execution
✅ Login page with Google OAuth integration
✅ Dark theme UI with professional PropTech design
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix executive summary API endpoint that returns 404 error. The issue appears to be in the IntelligenceEngine.generate_copilot_insight() or simulate_floor_closure() functions when processing properties for the executive summary aggregation.
